name: iconically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very famous, or typical of a particular country, group of people, etc.: Jones, with his iconically handsome face, plays the role of a former military policeman. Very few foods are quite so iconically American as a good hamburger.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen I arrived in Scotland, I bought some porridge and oatcakes, just to have something iconically Scottish on my shelves.Her music represents an iconically Brazilian mix of western melodies and African rhythms.The vehicle was described as the toughest and most iconically masculine pickup truck ever.
